domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump I told my team to slow down on the testing. 123000 dead. 45 million people unemployed. Covid-19 is increasing in states that opened too early. I'd say this is a complete and utter failure. There doesn't seem to be any kind of plan. You should be ashamed of yourself.
